text: Righteousness ne torn your vizagx towards orient okcident. Righteous est those kred en DI Last Tag angxel scripture prophets; ili don mon cheerfully relativ orf needy vojagx alien beggars liber sklav; ili observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) don obligatory charity (Zakat;) ili keep their vort whenever ili far promes; ili steadfastly persevere en des vizagx de persecution hardship milit! These est truthful; these est des righteous
